committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area Act of 2009

summary.text: Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area Act of 2009 - Establishes the Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area in Colorado. Designates the Poudre Heritage Alliance, a nonprofit, as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Alliance to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area.

titles.title: Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area Act of 2009
To establish the Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
